3分半、私に下さい。:
邪魔

掃除の邪魔よどきなさい‌
Give me three and a half minutes.<br>- G:
You're in the way of my cleaning.‌ Move.
- そうじのじゃまよどきなさい‌
- GT: 掃除の邪魔よどきなさい = Get in the way of cleaning
#邪魔じゃま:
  • hindrance; obstacle; nuisance; disturbance; interruption; interference
    (Noun; Na-adjective; Suru verb)

#退くどく:
  • to step aside; to move (i.e. out of the way); to make way
    (Godan verb with ku ending; intransitive verb; usu. written as kana)
